scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const dir = path.join(__dirname, '../../API/SolanaPvP.API_Project/wwwroot'); if (fs.existsSync(dir)) { fs.rmSync(dir, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('wwwroot cleaned'); }"
scripts.devBuild: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const dir = path.join(__dirname, '../../API/SolanaPvP.API_Project/wwwroot'); if (fs.existsSync(dir)) { fs.rmSync(dir, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('wwwroot cleaned'); }" && tsc -b && vite build --mode development --outDir ../../API/SolanaPvP.API_Project/wwwroot
scripts.relBuild: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const dir = path.join(__dirname, '../../API/SolanaPvP.API_Project/wwwroot'); if (fs.existsSync(dir)) { fs.rmSync(dir, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('wwwroot cleaned'); }" && tsc -b && vite build --mode production --outDir ../../API/SolanaPvP.API_Project/wwwroot
